Package com.ccprog3.myfarm.terminalinterface

Class MultiChoice

java.lang.Object
com.ccprog3.myfarm.terminalinterface.Question
com.ccprog3.myfarm.terminalinterface.MultiChoice
public class MultiChoice extends Question
A class that simplifies the building of multiple choice type question in terminals.
Author:
John Joseph F. Giron

  • Constructor Details

    • MultiChoice

      public MultiChoice(Scanner input, boolean hasBack, String caption, String... choices)
      Prepares the multiple choice type question.
      Parameters:
      input - main's Scanner object
      hasBack - if true, adds a "back" option, reverting to the previous question
      caption - displays long or short text describing the context of the question.
      choices - accepts multiple string arguments and store them into the list of choices. First string will be set at choice 1.

  • Method Details

    • invoke

      public boolean invoke()
      Displays the multiple choice type question and prompts the user to type the number that matches their choice.
      Specified by:
      invoke in class Question
      Returns:
      Returns true if the input is valid. Returns false otherwise
